SELECT fctr.fctr_pk, fctr.fctr_aspc_pk, fctr.fctr_pagador_prmt_pk, fctr.fctr_fcsr_pk, fctr.fctr_numero , fctr.fctr_fref, fctr.fctr_falta, fctr.fctr_fini, fctr.fctr_ffin, fctr.fctr_estado, fctr.fctr_es_suj_pasivo , fctr.fctr_info1, fctr.fctr_info2, fctr.fctr_info3, fctr.fctr_info4, fctr.fctr_info5, fctr.fctr_info6 , fctr.fctr_importe, fctr.fctr_impuesto , fctr.fctr_anulada_pk
, aspc_codigo, aspc_tpsr_pk
, fcsr_serie, fcsr_anio
, prmt_parametro AS fctr_pagador_prmt , prmt_tppr_pk AS fctr_pagador_tppr_pk
, fcan.fctr_numero AS fcan_fctr_numero
, ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_ext_pk = ( SELECT aspv_pk FROM tbl_aspecto_version_aspv WHERE aspv_aspc_pk = fctr.fctr_aspc_pk AND ( aspv_fini <= fctr.fctr_fref AND (aspv_ffin IS NULL OR aspv_ffin > fctr.fctr_fref) ) ) AND i18n_pref = 'aspv' AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} ) AS aspv_descripcion , ( SELECT prdt_cadena FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE prdt_tpdt_pk = ( SELECT tppr_tpdt_pk FROM tbl_tipo_parametro_tppr WHERE tppr_pk = prmt_tppr_pk ) AND prdt_prvr_pk = ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = fctr.fctr_pagador_prmt_pk AND prvr_fini <= fctr.fctr_fref AND (prvr_ffin IS NULL OR prvr_ffin > fctr.fctr_fref) ) ) AS fctr_pagador
FROM tbl_factura_fctr fctr INNER JOIN tbl_aspecto_aspc ON aspc_pk = fctr.fctr_aspc_pk INNER JOIN tbl_factura_serie_fcsr ON fcsr_pk = fctr.fctr_fcsr_pk INNER JOIN tbl_parametro_prmt ON prmt_pk = fctr.fctr_pagador_prmt_pk LEFT JOIN tbl_factura_fctr fcan ON fcan.fctr_pk = fctr.fctr_anulada_pk
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_factura_fctr fctr INNER JOIN tbl_aspecto_aspc ON aspc_pk = fctr_aspc_pk INNER JOIN tbl_factura_serie_fcsr ON fcsr_pk = fctr_fcsr_pk

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_valoracion_vlrc vlrc1 INNER JOIN tbl_valoracion_vlrc vlrc2 ON vlrc1.vlrc_fctr_pk <> vlrc2.vlrc_fctr_pk AND vlrc1.vlrc_srvc_pk = vlrc2.vlrc_srvc_pk AND vlrc2.vlrc_fref > vlrc1.vlrc_fref WHERE vlrc1.vlrc_fctr_pk = #{value}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_valoracion_vlrc vlrc JOIN tbl_valoracion_vlrc vlrc_fact ON vlrc_fact.vlrc_srvc_pk = vlrc.vlrc_srvc_pk AND vlrc.vlrc_fref > vlrc_fact.vlrc_fref AND vlrc.vlrc_pk <> vlrc_fact.vlrc_pk WHERE vlrc_fact.vlrc_fctr_pk = #{value}
